author: RTÉ News
title: Virus-hit cruise ship awaiting final clearance to dock
description: A virus-hit cruise ship with dozens of ill passengers and crew has neared the Florida coast, awaiting final clearance to dock after being barred from several South American countries.
content:
A virus-hit cruise ship with dozens of ill passengers and crew has bee cleared to dock in Florida, after being barred from several South American countries.
"The Coast Guard, Homeland Security, health officials, and Broward County have reached a decision to … [+3005 chars]
